Welcome to Controlit-handgesturecontrolleddiaporama’s documentation!¶

A Python-based computer vision system that uses hand gestures to control a face recognition interface. Built with OpenCV, MediaPipe, and face_recognition, the system can detect a specific professor’s face and execute interactions via predefined hand gestures.
